abstract: Nascar driver Tony Stewart, who has been sued for gross negligence in crash that killed driver Kevin Ward Jr, says he did not see Ward on track before he struck him and that Ward was impaired by marijuana at time.
lead_paragraph: Stewart said he did not see a driver walking on a dirt track last year before he struck and killed him, and he said the racer was impaired by marijuana and should not have been outside his car.

headline.main: Tony Stewart Responds to Negligence Suit

snippet: Stewart said he did not see a driver walking on a dirt track last year before he struck and killed him, and he said the racer was impaired by marijuana and should not have been outside his car.
